375284ca-66d8-4454-892b-eb87fcc95c14.description: Earners of the Commercial Academy Excellence badge have demonstrated commercial excellence in the development of their skill set so they can deliver excellence to their clients and drive growth for SGK.
375284ca-66d8-4454-892b-eb87fcc95c14.name: SGK Commercial Academy: Excellence

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in a 5 day Modular Development Program
Successful completion of an End of Program Assessment Presentation

a391a8f1-9e62-43cf-905e-2f6c26f94534.description: Earners of this designation have successfully completed the MAP learning journey to develop as future Matthews Enterprise Leaders. They have successfully networked and collaborated with others across the organization, sharing knowledge, best practices, and innovative ideas on strategic action learning projects and shown that they possess the ability to balance the demands required to achieve operational results, while making decisions, acting, and building teams that strengthen all of Matthews.
a391a8f1-9e62-43cf-905e-2f6c26f94534.name: Matthews Accelerated Program (MAP)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Course: CCL Leading for Organizational Impact (LOI)

Completion of Cohort Learning: Through the use of activities and discussions, participants explore several leadership topics to: Create commitment and align with the organization’s picture of future success; Build relationships and make alliances in service of others through open, diverse and deep networks; Practice hearing and understanding to draw out meaningful information in a conversation; Learn from experience and apply that learning to perform successfully in new & challenging situations

Completion of Matthews Formal Mentoring Program: Participants are engaged in a one-year mentoring relationship based on their needs by matching them with a more senior leader at Matthews to further their own personal development through learning, feedback, visibility, and expansion of their personal network.

Completion of Strategic Initiatives/Action Learning: Through the MAP learning journey, participants have focused on learning, practicing, and applying key skills and behaviors to work on a business related or enterprise-wide priority initiative. This enables them to develop as future Enterprise leaders and shows that they possess the ability to balance both the demands required to achieve operational results, while making decisions, acting, and building teams that strengthen all of Matthews.

ea6df670-93f6-44c7-9a20-5906cc65bd4f.description: Earners of this designation have successfully completed the MLE learning journey to develop as future Matthews senior leaders to lead from the middle by collaborating, influencing, networking, leading across boundaries, and building resiliency while being supported by their managers and a Mentor, and completing an organizational leadership challenge.
ea6df670-93f6-44c7-9a20-5906cc65bd4f.name: Matthews Leadership Experience (MLE)

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Course: CCL Leadership Development Program

Completion of Cohort Learning: Through the use of activities and discussions, participants explore several leadership topics to: Affect others’ actions, decisions, opinions or thinking using influence skills; Learn to understand and resolve conflicts; Establish Direction, Alignment, and Commitment (DAC) across boundaries in service of a higher vision or goal; Shape their leadership brand through actions and intentions to be more effective in their role.

Completion of Matthews Formal Mentoring Program. Participants are engaged in a one-year mentoring relationship based on their needs by matching them with a more senior leader at Matthews to further their own personal development through learning, feedback, visibility, and expansion of their personal network.

Completion of Key Leadership Challenge: Participants’ development is anchored in the context of a key leadership challenge - a very real, important organisational opportunity at Matthews. Working in teams, they apply key skills based on what they have learned to a specific leadership challenge, discuss with fellow cohort members, and shape plans addressing their challenge. Final closing event presentations are based on the results of this leadership challenge.

f25fd5ff-96e3-44be-8b6e-4020ddfaa6a2.description: Earners of the Commercial Academy Mastery Badge have demonstrated outstanding performance in delivering innovative, forward thinking client solutions by developing key behaviours to enable them to think outside of the box.
f25fd5ff-96e3-44be-8b6e-4020ddfaa6a2.name: SGK Commercial Academy: Mastery

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in a 6 day intensive Modular Development Program
Successful completion of an End of Program Assessment Presentation
